text: James "Jamie" Dornan (born 1 May 1982) is a Northern Irish actor, model, and musician. He played Axel von Fersen in Sofia Coppola's movie Marie Antoinette, Sheriff Graham Humbert in the ABC series Once Upon a Time and serial killer Paul Spector in the BBC Two crime drama series The Fall. He played the titular character, Christian Grey, in the movie Fifty Shades of Grey (2015). ==Early life== Dornan was born in Holywood, County Down, Northern Ireland. He grew up in the suburbs of Belfast, and has two older sisters. His father, Professor Jim Dornan, is an obstetrician who had also considered becoming an actor. Jamie Dornan is a first cousin, twice removed, of actress Greer Garson. His grandparents on both sides of his family were Methodist lay preachers. Dornan was 16 when his mother, Lorna, died.Warning: This Interview Will Make You Fall Totally In Love With Jamie Dornan , Marie Claire ==Career== He was a member of folk band called Sons of Jim, until it disbanded in 2008. His modeling career has included cover and feature shoots for publications such as Abercrombie & Fitch, Aquascutum, Hugo Boss, Armani, Dior Homme and Calvin Klein (with both Kate Moss and Eva Mendes), and he was labelled "The Golden Torso" by The New York Times. His first acting role in a film was Count Axel Fersen in the Sofia Coppola film Marie Antoinette (2006). After that, he appeared films and TV series such as Beyond the Rave, Shadows in the Sun, Fifty Shades of Grey; Once Upon a Time and The Fall. In 2014, he was ranked #3 in People Magazine's Sexiest Man Alive list. He married English actress and singer Amelia Warner in Somerset on 27 April 2013. They have one daughter together Dulcie (b. November 2013) ==Filmography== ===Movies=== Year Title Role Notes 2006 Marie Antoinette Axel von Fersen 2008 Beyond the Rave Ed 2009 Nice to Meet You The Young Man Short movie 2009 Shadows in the Sun Joe 2009 X Returns X Short movie 2010 The Black Widow Short movie 2014 Flying Home Colin 2015 Fifty Shades of Grey Christian Grey It grossed $570 million worldwide. 2015 The 9th Life of Louis Drax Dr. Allan Pascal CompletedOliver Platt, Molly Parker Join ‘The 9th Life of Louis Drax’ Variety.com 2016 Anthropoid Jan Kubiš Post-production ===Television=== Year Title Role Notes 2011–2013 Once Upon a Time The Huntsman/Sheriff Graham Humbert 9 episodes 2013–present The Fall Paul Spector 11 episodes 2014 New Worlds Abe Goffe 4 episodes ==Discography== Year Single 2005 "Fairytale" 2006 "My Burning Sun" ==Awards and nominations== Year Award Category Result Work 2014 Broadcasting Press Guild Awards The Fall 2014 Irish Film and Television Awards Best Lead Actor - Television The Fall 2014 Irish Film and Television Awards Rising star 2014 British Academy Television Award Best Actor The Fall ==References== ==Other website== * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Northern Ireland Category:British models Category:Musicians from Northern Ireland Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:People from County Down
